970550.name: Color Chain
970550.description:
Color Chain is a small casual tile-matching video game.

Create Color Chains by linking tiles of alternating colors, and rotate them to create groups of 7 or more similarly colored tiles!

Create longer Color Chains and combos to reach higher and higher scores!



Game played entirely with mouse.

Game available in English and French.



Game by Djack D Donovan

Music and Sounds by Corentin Brasart

Icons by Marie Sivignon
970550.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
